Frayed Steel Cable.examine_details: The wires are rusted and frayed, a clear sign of long-term neglect. This was not a sudden failure; it was an inevitability.

Carnival Inspection Records.name: Carnival Inspection Records
Carnival Inspection Records.description: A clipboard holding inspection records for the McKinley County Fair.
Carnival Inspection Records.examine_details: The safety inspection for the 'Devil's Wheel' is pencil-whipped. The inspector's signature is a lazy, illegible squiggle, and several critical checks are marked 'N/A'.

Ride Operator's Manual.name: Ride Operator's Manual
Ride Operator's Manual.description: A grease-stained manual for the Ferris Wheel, its pages dog-eared and worn.
Ride Operator's Manual.examine_details: A highlighted section warns against operating the ride during high winds. A handwritten note next to it reads, 'Boss says run it anyway. Don't want to lose money.'

Twisted Metal Fragment.name: Twisted Metal Fragment
Twisted Metal Fragment.description: A jagged piece of painted red metal, clearly from a large structure.
Twisted Metal Fragment.examine_details: The metal is twisted into an unnatural shape. You can see a serial number stamped on it, matching the one for the collapsed Ferris Wheel.

Burnt Fuselage Panel.name: Burnt Fuselage Panel
Burnt Fuselage Panel.description: A piece of an airplane's fuselage, blackened and warped by intense heat.
Burnt Fuselage Panel.examine_details: Scratched into the soot is a single word: 'FAULT'. It seems someone knew something was wrong before the end.

Passenger's Diary.name: Passenger's Diary
Passenger's Diary.description: A small, leather-bound diary, singed at the edges but mostly intact.
Passenger's Diary.examine_details: The last entry reads: 'Strange turbulence today. There was a loud bang from the wing a few minutes ago. The flight attendants look nervous.'

Black Box Transcript.name: Black Box Transcript
Black Box Transcript.description: A printed transcript of the cockpit voice recorder from Flight 180.
Black Box Transcript.examine_details: The final moments are a chilling record of confusion and terror. 'What was that noise?' the pilot asks. 'Hydraulics are gone... we're losing...'

Stage Production Schedule.name: Stage Production Schedule
Stage Production Schedule.description: A detailed schedule for the production of 'McKinley: The Musical!'.
Stage Production Schedule.examine_details: Notes in the margin indicate that the weight of the new lighting rig was never tested with the old stage supports. A circled note reads: 'Is this safe???'

Frayed Rigging Rope.name: Frayed Rigging Rope
Frayed Rigging Rope.description: A thick, coarse rope used for stage rigging. It's frayed almost to the breaking point.
Frayed Rigging Rope.examine_details: This rope was clearly old and overloaded. It's a miracle it held as long as it did. It smells of dust and negligence.

Crushed Playbill.name: Crushed Playbill
Crushed Playbill.description: A playbill for the show, crushed and stained with something dark.
Crushed Playbill.examine_details: On the back, a list of the cast and crew. Every name has been crossed out in red ink, except for one: the visionary who tried to warn everyone.

Leaking Life Vest.name: Leaking Life Vest
Leaking Life Vest.description: A bright orange life vest, still damp. It has a small, almost unnoticeable puncture near the seam.
Leaking Life Vest.examine_details: The puncture mark is clean, as if made by a sharp object. It wouldn't have held air for long. A small, cruel detail in a large tragedy.

Captain's Log.name: Captain's Log
Captain's Log.description: A water-damaged logbook from the 'Queen Isabella'.
Captain's Log.examine_details: The last entry, written in a shaky hand, reads: 'Took on a strange vibration after that speedboat incident. Should be fine. The owner insists we stay on schedule.'

Corroded Hull Plate.name: Corroded Hull Plate
Corroded Hull Plate.description: A piece of the ferry's hull, recovered from the wreckage. It's covered in rust.
Corroded Hull Plate.examine_details: The metal is thin and brittle, eaten away by years of corrosion. It's clear the ferry's maintenance was severely neglected.

Sheared Rollercoaster Bolt.name: Sheared Rollercoaster Bolt
Sheared Rollercoaster Bolt.description: A massive, heavy steel bolt, sheared clean in two.
Sheared Rollercoaster Bolt.examine_details: The break is clean, a sign of catastrophic metal fatigue. This bolt was a ticking time bomb.

Park Maintenance Invoice.name: Park Maintenance Invoice
Park Maintenance Invoice.description: A crumpled invoice from a third-party maintenance company.
Park Maintenance Invoice.examine_details: The invoice is for 'superficial cosmetic repairs' to the 'Demon's Peak' ride. A recommendation for a full structural analysis is marked 'declined by client'.

Victim's Dropped Camera.name: Victim's Dropped Camera
Victim's Dropped Camera.description: A small digital camera, its screen cracked but still functional.
Victim's Dropped Camera.examine_details: The last photo taken is a blurry shot of the rollercoaster's support structure. In the corner of the frame, a crucial bolt is visibly loose.

Faulty Wiring Report.name: Faulty Wiring Report
Faulty Wiring Report.description: A report from the city fire inspector about the 'Crimson Lounge'.
Faulty Wiring Report.examine_details: The report cites numerous fire code violations, including 'outdated and hazardous wiring'. It's dated six months before the fire.

Melted Fire Sprinkler.name: Melted Fire Sprinkler
Melted Fire Sprinkler.description: The head of a fire sprinkler, melted and deformed by intense heat.
Melted Fire Sprinkler.examine_details: The sprinkler head is clogged with what looks like paint. It was never going to work.

Blocked Exit Sign.name: Blocked Exit Sign
Blocked Exit Sign.description: An 'EXIT' sign, covered in soot. The plastic is warped.
Blocked Exit Sign.examine_details: Someone had placed a large, decorative plant in front of this emergency exit. It would have been impossible to see in the smoke.

Fractured Suspension Cable.name: Fractured Suspension Cable
Fractured Suspension Cable.description: A section of thick steel cable from the McKinley Memorial Bridge.
Fractured Suspension Cable.examine_details: A clean fracture reveals a dark, rusted core. The cable was rotting from the inside out.

Bridge Stress Test Results.name: Bridge Stress Test Results
Bridge Stress Test Results.description: A folder containing the results of the last stress test on the bridge.
Bridge Stress Test Results.examine_details: The results show the bridge failed to meet safety standards, but a handwritten note says 'Politically unfeasible to close for repairs. Monitor closely.'

Traffic Camera Footage.name: Traffic Camera Footage
Traffic Camera Footage.description: A USB drive containing footage from a traffic camera overlooking the bridge.
Traffic Camera Footage.examine_details: The footage shows the bridge swaying unnaturally in the wind for hours before the collapse. The disaster was not sudden; it was inevitable.

Leaking Chemical Barrel.name: Leaking Chemical Barrel
Leaking Chemical Barrel.description: A 55-gallon drum with a chemical warning label. A dark fluid leaks from a corroded seam.
Leaking Chemical Barrel.examine_details: The warning label is for a highly volatile chemical. The leak is slow but steady, a disaster waiting for a catalyst.

Safety Violation Notice.name: Safety Violation Notice
Safety Violation Notice.description: An official notice of safety violations issued to the McKinley Chemical Plant.
Safety Violation Notice.examine_details: The notice lists 'improper storage of volatile chemicals' as a critical issue. The fine was paid, but the problem was never fixed.

Employee's Warning Letter.name: Employee's Warning Letter
Employee's Warning Letter.description: A crumpled, tear-stained letter from a plant employee to management.
Employee's Warning Letter.examine_details: The letter desperately warns of the dangerous conditions and predicts a catastrophic failure. 'You're going to kill us all,' it ends.

Discarded Cigarette Pack.name: Discarded Cigarette Pack
Discarded Cigarette Pack.description: An empty pack of cigarettes, found near the origin point of the wildfire.
Discarded Cigarette Pack.examine_details: It's a small, careless mistake that led to a massive tragedy. A single spark is all it takes.

Park Ranger's Map.name: Park Ranger's Map
Park Ranger's Map.description: A map of McKinley National Forest, with handwritten notes.
Park Ranger's Map.examine_details: The ranger has circled several areas, noting 'high fire risk' and 'dry conditions'. The origin of the fire is in one of these circled areas.

Melted Animal Figurine.name: Melted Animal Figurine
Melted Animal Figurine.description: A small, plastic figurine of a deer, melted into an unrecognizable shape by intense heat.
Melted Animal Figurine.examine_details: A poignant reminder of the innocent lives, both human and animal, caught in the inferno.

Clogged Storm Drain Photo.name: Clogged Storm Drain Photo
Clogged Storm Drain Photo.description: A photo showing a downtown storm drain completely clogged with leaves and debris.
Clogged Storm Drain Photo.examine_details: The photo is dated one week before the flood. The city was warned, but nothing was done.

Weather Alert Printout.name: Weather Alert Printout
Weather Alert Printout.description: A printout of a severe weather alert for McKinley.
Weather Alert Printout.examine_details: The alert warns of 'unprecedented rainfall' and 'high risk of flash flooding'. It was issued hours before the storm hit.

Water-Damaged Family Photo.name: Water-Damaged Family Photo
Water-Damaged Family Photo.description: A family photo, warped and stained by floodwater.
Water-Damaged Family Photo.examine_details: A happy family smiles at the camera, oblivious to the fate that awaits them. A reminder of the human cost of the disaster.

Faulty Signal Report.name: Faulty Signal Report
Faulty Signal Report.description: A maintenance report for the McKinley rail system.
Faulty Signal Report.examine_details: The report details a 'persistent malfunction' in the signal system at the site of the collision. It was deemed 'non-critical'.

Engineer's Schedule.name: Engineer's Schedule
Engineer's Schedule.description: A work schedule for one of the train engineers.
Engineer's Schedule.examine_details: The schedule shows the engineer had been working for 18 hours straight. Fatigue was a contributing factor.

Bent Piece of Track.name: Bent Piece of Track
Bent Piece of Track.description: A heavy piece of steel rail, bent into a slight curve.
Bent Piece of Track.examine_details: The bend is subtle, but enough to cause a high-speed derailment. A flaw that went unnoticed until it was too late.

Cracked Foundation Photo.name: Cracked Foundation Photo
Cracked Foundation Photo.description: A photo of the apartment building's foundation, showing a large crack.
Cracked Foundation Photo.examine_details: The photo is time-stamped a year before the collapse. The building was dying long before it fell.

Building Code Violation.name: Building Code Violation
Building Code Violation.description: An official notice of a building code violation for the apartment complex.
Building Code Violation.examine_details: The violation is for using substandard building materials. A fine was paid, but the structural issues were never addressed.

Tenant's Complaint Letter.name: Tenant's Complaint Letter
Tenant's Complaint Letter.description: A letter from a tenant to the building manager, complaining about strange noises.
Tenant's Complaint Letter.examine_details: 'The building groans at night,' the letter reads. 'It sounds like it's in pain.' The letter is unanswered.

Seismograph Printout.name: Seismograph Printout
Seismograph Printout.description: A printout from a local seismograph, showing minor tremors in the days leading up to the earthquake.
Seismograph Printout.examine_details: The tremors were too small to be felt, but they were a clear warning sign of the larger event to come.

Gas Line Warning Tag.name: Gas Line Warning Tag
Gas Line Warning Tag.description: A yellow warning tag from a gas line in the neighborhood.
Gas Line Warning Tag.examine_details: The tag warns that the gas line is old and needs to be replaced. It's dated two years before the earthquake.

Fallen Power Line.name: Fallen Power Line
Fallen Power Line.description: A section of heavy-duty power line, snapped in two.
Fallen Power Line.examine_details: The break is clean, a sign of the immense force of the earthquake. This was a major source of post-quake fires.

Broken Barometer.name: Broken Barometer
Broken Barometer.description: An old-fashioned barometer, its glass cracked and needle stuck at the lowest possible pressure.
Broken Barometer.examine_details: It was a clear sign of the approaching storm, a warning that went unheeded.

Evacuation Order.name: Evacuation Order
Evacuation Order.description: A mandatory evacuation order for the coastal areas of McKinley.
Evacuation Order.examine_details: The order was issued just hours before the typhoon hit, too late for many to escape.

Ship in a Bottle.name: Ship in a Bottle
Ship in a Bottle.description: A small, intricate model of a ship inside a glass bottle, miraculously unbroken.
Ship in a Bottle.examine_details: A tiny, perfect world, safe from the storm outside. A reminder of the fragility of life.

Geological Survey Map.name: Geological Survey Map
Geological Survey Map.description: A geological map of the McKinley area, showing a network of underground caves.
Geological Survey Map.examine_details: The business district was built directly on top of an unstable cave system. The sinkhole was a geological certainty.

Broken Water Main Pipe.name: Broken Water Main Pipe
Broken Water Main Pipe.description: A section of a massive water main pipe, cracked and corroded.
Broken Water Main Pipe.examine_details: The pipe had been leaking for years, slowly eroding the ground beneath the city. The sinkhole was a man-made disaster.

Security Camera Hard Drive.name: Security Camera Hard Drive
Security Camera Hard Drive.description: A hard drive from a security camera that overlooked the sinkhole area.
Security Camera Hard Drive.examine_details: The footage shows the ground beginning to sag and crack for days before the collapse. The warnings were there, but no one was watching.

Empty Lifeboat Davit.name: Empty Lifeboat Davit
Empty Lifeboat Davit.description: A heavy-duty davit for a lifeboat, its release mechanism rusted shut.
Empty Lifeboat Davit.examine_details: The lifeboat could never have been launched. It was a piece of safety equipment that was purely for show.

Ship's Itinerary.name: Ship's Itinerary
Ship's Itinerary.description: The official itinerary for the cruise ship, showing a planned route change.
Ship's Itinerary.examine_details: The route was changed at the last minute to pass through a narrow, dangerous channel, a shortcut to save time and fuel.

Speedboat Registration.name: Speedboat Registration
Speedboat Registration.description: The registration papers for the speedboat that collided with the cruise ship.
Speedboat Registration.examine_details: The boat was stolen. The collision was not an accident; it was a deliberate act of sabotage.

Dam Inspection Report.name: Dam Inspection Report
Dam Inspection Report.description: A report on the structural integrity of the Manitou Valley dam.
Dam Inspection Report.examine_details: The report shows evidence of 'significant structural stress' and recommends immediate repairs. The report is a year old.

Warning Siren Log.name: Warning Siren Log
Warning Siren Log.description: A logbook for the dam's warning siren system.
Warning Siren Log.examine_details: The last test of the siren was six months before the dam break. The entry is marked 'failed'.

Waterlogged Picnic Basket.name: Waterlogged Picnic Basket
Waterlogged Picnic Basket.description: A wicker picnic basket, warped and stained by river water.
Waterlogged Picnic Basket.examine_details: Inside is a single, uneaten sandwich. A tragic reminder of a day that started with such promise.

Corroded Pipe Section.name: Corroded Pipe Section
Corroded Pipe Section.description: A section of the exploded gas pipeline, its metal thin and corroded.
Corroded Pipe Section.examine_details: The pipe is paper-thin in places, a clear sign of decades of neglect. The explosion was inevitable.

Pipeline Pressure Gauge.name: Pipeline Pressure Gauge
Pipeline Pressure Gauge.description: A pressure gauge from the pipeline, its needle frozen in the red zone.
Pipeline Pressure Gauge.examine_details: The pressure in the pipeline was dangerously high. The explosion was not just a leak; it was a catastrophic failure.

Farmer's Complaint Letter.name: Farmer's Complaint Letter
Farmer's Complaint Letter.description: A letter from a local farmer to the gas company, complaining about a strange smell.
Farmer's Complaint Letter.examine_details: 'It smells like gas out here,' the letter reads. 'I'm worried something's wrong.' The letter is dated two weeks before the explosion.

Overloaded Support Beam.name: Overloaded Support Beam
Overloaded Support Beam.description: A section of a steel support beam from the factory, bent and twisted.
Overloaded Support Beam.examine_details: The beam is bent at an impossible angle, a sign of the immense weight it was forced to bear. The collapse was a matter of when, not if.

Factory Floor Plan.name: Factory Floor Plan
Factory Floor Plan.description: A blueprint of the factory floor, showing the placement of heavy machinery.
Factory Floor Plan.examine_details: The machinery was placed directly over the weakest part of the floor, a clear violation of safety regulations.

Union Grievance Form.name: Union Grievance Form
Union Grievance Form.description: A grievance form filed by the factory workers' union.
Union Grievance Form.examine_details: The form complains of 'unsafe working conditions' and 'structural instability'. The company's response is a single word: 'denied'.

Sheared Escalator Gear.name: Sheared Escalator Gear
Sheared Escalator Gear.description: A heavy, metal gear from the escalator's motor, its teeth sheared off.
Sheared Escalator Gear.examine_details: The gear is made of a cheap, brittle alloy. It was never designed to handle the stress of a crowded shopping mall.

Maintenance Log.name: Maintenance Log
Maintenance Log.description: A maintenance log for the mall's escalators.
Maintenance Log.examine_details: The log shows that the escalator had been reported as 'making strange noises' for weeks. The last entry reads: 'Needs full replacement. Mgmt denied.'

Mall Security Footage.name: Mall Security Footage
Mall Security Footage.description: A USB drive containing security footage of the escalator.
Mall Security Footage.examine_details: The footage shows the escalator shuddering and lurching for days before the accident. The disaster was not a surprise; it was an ignored warning.

Snapped Support Cable.name: Snapped Support Cable
Snapped Support Cable.description: A thick steel cable from the window washer platform, its end a mess of snapped wires.
Snapped Support Cable.examine_details: The cable is frayed and rusted, a clear sign of neglect. It was a tragedy waiting to happen.

Building Maintenance Contract.name: Building Maintenance Contract
Building Maintenance Contract.description: A contract for the building's maintenance, showing the lowest possible bidder was chosen.
Building Maintenance Contract.examine_details: The contract explicitly excludes 'regular safety inspections' of the window washing equipment. A cost-cutting measure that proved fatal.

Pigeon Feather.name: Pigeon Feather
Pigeon Feather.description: A single, grey pigeon feather, found near the snapped cable.
Pigeon Feather.examine_details: A seemingly innocent object, but it was a pigeon landing on the frayed cable that caused the final, fatal snap. A perfect example of Death's design.

Overheated Bearing.name: Overheated Bearing
Overheated Bearing.description: A metal bearing from the grain silo's conveyor system, scorched and warped.
Overheated Bearing.examine_details: The bearing seized from the heat, creating the spark that ignited the grain dust. A tiny failure that led to a massive explosion.

Dust Collection System Report.name: Dust Collection System Report
Dust Collection System Report.description: A report on the silo's dust collection system.
Dust Collection System Report.examine_details: The report shows the system was 'critically malfunctioning' and 'creating an explosive atmosphere'. The report was never acted upon.

Static Discharge Warning.name: Static Discharge Warning
Static Discharge Warning.description: A warning sign from inside the silo, almost completely obscured by grain dust.
Static Discharge Warning.examine_details: The sign warns of the danger of static discharge in a dusty environment. The irony is palpable.

screwdriver.name: Screwdriver
screwdriver.description: A sturdy flat-head screwdriver. Useful for repairs and prying things open.

multi_tool.name: Multi-Tool
multi_tool.description: A compact multi-tool with pliers, knife, screwdriver, and more.

insulating_tape.name: Insulating Tape
insulating_tape.description: A roll of insulating tape. Useful for covering exposed wires.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.description: A heavy hammer. Good for construction, repairs, or smashing things.

wedge.name: Wedge
wedge.description: A small wooden wedge. Can be used to stabilize objects.

rope.name: Rope
rope.description: A sturdy length of rope. Useful for tying or securing objects.

support_beam.name: Support Beam
support_beam.description: A heavy metal support beam. Can reinforce structures.

cloth.name: Cloth
cloth.description: A clean piece of cloth. Useful for cleaning, absorbing, or insulating.

nail_gun.name: Nail Gun
nail_gun.description: A heavy-duty nail gun, capable of driving nails with dangerous force. It can be loaded with a strip of nails and used as a tool or weapon.
nail_gun.examine_details: The nail gun is currently {state}. Handle with caremisfires can be deadly.

idle.description: The nail gun sits quietly, unloaded or with an empty strip.

loaded.description: The nail gun is loaded and ready to fire.

precarious.description: The nail gun is balanced dangerously on the edge.

use_result.construction: You use the nail gun to fasten objects securely.
use_result.fastening: The nail gun works perfectly, driving nails with precision.
use_result.hazard_sabotage: You fire the nail gun at a hazard. A nail shoots out and embeds in the target.

examine.message: A heavy-duty nail gun, currently {state}. It looks dangerous if mishandled.

take.message: You pick up the nail gun. Handle with care!

use.message: You use the nail gun to fasten objects securely.
use.success_message: The nail gun works perfectly, driving nails with precision.
use.failure_message: The nail gun jams or misfires!

fire.success_message: A nail shoots out and embeds in the target.
fire.failure_message: The nail gun misfires, sending a nail flying unpredictably!

reload.message: You reload the nail gun with a fresh strip of nails.
reload.success_message: The nail gun is now loaded and ready to fire.
reload.failure_message: You fumble the reload and drop the strip of nails.

tool_kit.name: Tool Kit
tool_kit.description: A compact tool kit containing various hand tools like pliers, wrenches, and a small hammer.

mop.name: Mop
mop.description: A standard mop. Useful for cleaning up spills.

elevator.name: elevator
elevator.description: A stainless steel hospital elevator, used for moving between floors.
elevator.examine_text: A stainless steel hospital elevator. The panel hums softly.

elevator_call_panel.name: elevator call panel
elevator_call_panel.description: A wall-mounted control panel for calling the elevator.
elevator_call_panel.examine_text: A wall-mounted control panel with worn buttons.

pliers.name: Pliers
pliers.description: A pair of heavy-duty pliers. The rubber grips are worn, but the steel head is solid.
pliers.examine_details: The serrated jaws look strong enough to cut wire or bend soft metal.

usable.self_use_message: You snap the pliers in the air. They make a satisfying *clack*.
usable.use_on_success_message: You use the pliers on the {target}.

broken_pliers.name: Broken Pliers
broken_pliers.description: A pair of pliers, snapped in half at the joint. Useless now.
broken_pliers.examine_details: One handle is missing, and the head is rusted solid. This is just junk.

revolving door.name: revolving door
revolving door.description: A large revolving door at the hospital entrance.

emergency_generator.name: emergency generator
emergency_generator.description: A backup generator that powers the hospital during outages.

power_line.name: power line
power_line.description: A high-voltage power line supplying electricity to the building.

gas_meter.name: gas meter
gas_meter.description: A meter that measures the flow of gas into the hospital.

ventilator.name: ventilator
ventilator.description: A machine that assists patients with breathing in the hospital.

patient in bed.name: patient in bed
patient in bed.description: A hospital patient lying in bed, possibly in need of care.

vital signs monitor.name: vital signs monitor
vital signs monitor.description: A monitor displaying the patient's vital signs.

robo_vacuum.name: Robotic Vacuum
robo_vacuum.description: A compact, automated cleaning drone. This one seems to have a mind of its own.
robo_vacuum.examine_details: It's a standard 'Room-Bot' model, but someone has affixed googly eyes to the front. A faint red light pulses from beneath its shell.

vacuum_battery.name: Vacuum Battery
vacuum_battery.description: A heavy lithium-ion battery pack, salvaged from a robotic vacuum.
vacuum_battery.examine_details: It's still holding a charge. Might be useful for powering other electronics.

robot_vacuum_item.name: Deactivated Robo-Vacuum
robot_vacuum_item.description: A 'Room-Bot' model, now safely powered down. It's surprisingly heavy.
robot_vacuum_item.examine_details: Its googly eyes are slightly crooked. Now that it's off, you could probably take it.

broken_vacuum_parts.name: Broken Vacuum Parts
broken_vacuum_parts.description: A handful of charred plastic, wiring, and a single, sad googly eye.
